edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.framework.factories

Class DefaultFactoryManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.memphis.ccrg.lida.framework.factories.DefaultFactoryManager

    public class DefaultFactoryManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements FactoryManager
    A default implementation of the FactoryManager interface. TODO: Add details about the XML configuration file expectations and usage.

    • Method Detail

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Reset the FactoryManager to an uninitialized state.

      • getFactory

        public <T extends Factory> T getFactory(java.lang.Class<T> type)
        Returns an implementation matching the specified Factory interface. A factory must have been registered as a default in the factories XML configuration file using the "default" attribute of the factory type. If no match is found for the specified interface, or no factory was registered as the default for that type, then null will be returned.
        Specified by:
        getFactory in interface FactoryManager
        Parameters:
        type - a Factory interface for which an implementation will be returned
        Returns:
        an implementation for the specified interface

      • getFactory

        public <T extends Factory> T getFactory(java.lang.String name,
                               java.lang.Class<T> type)
        Returns a Factory implementation matching the specified factory name and interface. The factory name should correspond to a "name" attribute in the XML configuration file used to initialize the FactoryManager. If no match is found for the specified criteria then null will be returned.
        Specified by:
        getFactory in interface FactoryManager
        Parameters:
        name - a name for the factory (set in the XML factory configuration)
        type - a Factory interface for which an implementation will be returned
        Returns:
        an implementation for the specified interface

      • getInstance

        public static DefaultFactoryManager getInstance()
        Returns the sole instance of this class. Implements the Singleton pattern.
        Returns:
        sole instance of this class

      • init

        public void init(java.util.Properties props)
          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Initializes the FactoryManager and its factories based on the contents of the supplied properties file. The properties file is expected to have a property that specifies the location on the LidaFactories XML configuration file.
        Specified by:
        init in interface FactoryManager
        Parameters:
        props - a properties file containing factory config information
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the supplied properties file is null or contains invalid configuration information
